nodes.title: Design and Simulation analysis of a Leaf spring suspension
nodes.description:
The main aim of the present work is to optimize the material 
selection for the leaf spring. For this modeling of leaf spring is 
done in Creo 2.0 with selected dimensions and static analysis 
is done in ANSYS 14.0 for selected design parameters. 
Obtained results are compared graphically to achieve the main 
objective of research. i.e. best material selection for the leaf 
spring

nodes.title: Rice Transplanting Machine
nodes.description: The project aims at optimizing the transplanting mechanism of the Rice Transplanter, to get a better yield. This is done by optimising the four-bar linkage with the help of MATLAB. The CAD drawings of the parts were made using CATIA.
